participant_1.background:
My neighbor comes over all the time to watch rugby with me.
I like to fly kites.
I love sports , but rugby is my favorite.
I work out every other day.

participant_2.background:
I like standing in the rain.
Sometimes i wish my computer would work faster.
Rita hayworth is the woman of my dreams.
My glasses are always dirty and i can t seem to get them clean.

content.text: Hello! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to stand in the rain.
I don't know, it's just calming.
That's interesting. I've never heard of anyone liking that before.
Yeah, it's not a very popular thing to do.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch movies, play video games, and read books.
I like to do those things too!
Cool! What are some of your favorite movies?
I like a lot of different movies, but some of my favorites are The Lord of the Rings trilogy, The Shawshank Redemption, and The Princess Bride.
Those are all great movies! I love The Lord of the Rings trilogy too.
I'm glad to hear that! What are some of your favorite video games?
I like a lot of different video games too, but some of my favorites are The Legend of Zelda series, Final Fantasy, and Minecraft.
Those are all great games! I love The Legend of Zelda series too.
I'm glad to hear that! What are some of your favorite books?
I like a lot of different books, but some of my favorites are To Kill a Mockingbird, The Great Gatsby, and The Catcher in the Rye.
Those are all great books! I love To Kill a Mockingbird too.
